actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the rates of pay for Members of Congress shall be the rates in effect on September 30, 1975, until such time as they are fixed otherwise by law.

summary.text: Sets the annual rate of pay for Members of Congress and the Vice President at the rate in effect on September 30, 1975. Removes the authority of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries to review salaries of Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the rates of pay for Members of Congress shall be the rates in effect on September 30, 1975, until such time as they are fixed otherwise by law.
